SELECT HOSPITAL_CODE, HOSPITAL_NAME, HOSPITAL_PHONE, HOSPITAL_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(INPUT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS INPUT_DATE FROM HOSPITAL WHERE 1 = 1
AND (HOSPITAL_CODE LIKE '%' || #admin_search_hos# || '%' OR HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE '%' || #admin_search_hos# || '%' OR HOSPITAL_PHONE LIKE '%' || #admin_search_hos# || '%' OR HOSPITAL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #admin_search_hos# || '%')

SELECT L.CODE_NAME AS LV, E.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, E.PHONE, E.EMAIL, P.CODE_NAME AS POSITION, O.CODE_NAME AS OFFICE, S.CODE_NAME AS SEX, A.CODE_NAME AS ACTI FROM EMP E LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG = 10) L ON E.LV_CODE = L.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG = 8) P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG = 9) O ON E.OFFICE_CODE = O.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG = 2) S ON E.SEX_CODE = S.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG = 14) A ON E.ACTIVATED = A.SMALL WHERE E.HOSPITAL_CODE = #admin_opt_hosclick#

SELECT HOSPITAL_CODE, HOSPITAL_NAME, HOSPITAL_ADDRESS, SUBSTR(HOSPITAL_PHONE,1,3) AS P1,SUBSTR(HOSPITAL_PHONE,4,4) AS P2,SUBSTR(HOSPITAL_PHONE,8,4) AS P3 FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #onclickinfo#
